summary: An AI application called 'Axora AI' with a dark/black theme that displays videos and pictures, solves math problems from kindergarten to college level, includes a sidebar showing previous chat history, allows users to request AI-generated images and videos by describing what they want, features a translator chat box for translating different languages, includes a music generator that lets users create beats and music or have the AI generate music for them, includes an art component with a drawing canvas featuring colors and other tools plus a chat box that provides drawing and painting ideas, and includes a scripter component that allows users to describe scripts they want the AI to generate
architectural_notes: AI-powered application with multi-modal content display
Educational focus with adaptive math difficulty levels
Dark theme UI with black background
Math solver extended to support college-level operations beyond K-12
Multi-language translation feature via dedicated chat box interface
Teacher Mode feature in math solver provides pedagogical explanations alongside solutions
Music generation capability with both manual beat creation and AI-assisted composition
Art creation module with canvas-based drawing interface and AI-powered creative suggestions
